@paud_ie Sounds good. We were doing a "you are the teacher" thing so the students did with the whole thing themselves. It was pretty cool.

@paud_ie They all had to narrate their own part in the process. There was brown play-doh for the grand finale!
@paud_ie One guy (the food) had to walk through. He got chewed up, soaked in stomach acid and churned etc. The appendix did nothing.
@paud_ie We got a team of our TYs to teach this to the rest of the group. They assigned roles to everyone; teeth, stomach etc....
